Kartik Aaryan Height | Weight | Age | Movies | Family | Biography | Wiki

Bolly Reporter
3 months ago

Kartik Aaryan is an Indian Bollywood actor who made his acting debut with Luv Ranjan’s buddy film “Pyaar Ka Punchnama”. Currently, he is one of the most famous Hindi film actors. Furthermore, he is very popular among youngsters.

Biography & Wiki

Kartik Aaryan’s real rame is Kartik Tiwari. His nickname is Koki. His mother fondly called him as Guddu. He was born on born on 22 November 1988 in Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh, India. As a result, his current age is 31 years. Kartik’s Zodiac is Scorpio.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Family Members

Both parents of Kartik are doctors. His father’s name is Manish Tiwari, who is a Paediatrician. His mother’s name is Mala Tiwari, who is a Gynaecologist. He has a Younger sister named Kittu, who is also a Doctor.

Education and School, College

Kartik did his schooling from St. Paul’s School, Gwalior, India. After that, he joined Kiddy’s School, Gwalior, India. Later on, he went to DY Patil College, Navi Mumbai to pursue an engineering degree in Biotechnology. He did an acting course from the Kreating Charakters institute.

After the release of Pyaar Ka Punchnama, Aaryan completed his engineering degree on the insistence of his mother.

Girls, affairs, spouse name

Kartik Aaryan dated with actor and co-star Nushrat Bharucha. They have co-starred in three films – two “Pyaar Ka Punchnama” movies and the latest “Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety”. They never admit their relationship in public.

As per media, Kartik also dated with Fatima Sana Shaikh. Also, there is a rumor that he dated Sara Ali Khan. But the couple breaks up after the buzz coming, that Kartik dated with Ananya Panday.

Kartik Aaryan filmography

Firstly, Kartik began a modeling career while he was in university and after three years of unsuccessfully auditioning for films. He made his acting debut with Luv Ranjan’s film Pyaar Ka Punchnama (2011), co-starring Divyendu Sharma, Raayo S Bakhirta, and Nushrat Bharucha, which revolves around the romantic tribulations faced by three young men. In Pyaar Ka Punchnama, his character’s four-minute monologue was one of the lengthiest single shots done for a Hindi film to that point. After the success of this movie, he played Akaash Vani and Kaanchi: The Unbreakable. However, both films were not successful in the box office.

Kartik starred in Luv Ranjan’s comedy sequel Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2 in 2015 with Nushrat Bharucha and added the actors Omkar Kapoor and Sunny Singh. Even in this movie, he delivered an even longer, seven-minute single-shot monologue. The film earns ₹880 million against a budget of ₹220 million.

In 2018 when Kartik collaborated with Luv Ranjan and Nushrat Bharucha for the fourth time in “Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety“. The film emerged as his biggest success and earned ₹1.5 billion. Above all, this movie becomes a turning point in Kartik’s career. After the success of this film, he got many offers.

His next ventures are Luka Chuppi, Pati Patni Aur Woh, Dostana 2, Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2, etc.

Awards & Recognitions

  • In 2015 he got Stardust Award for Best Actor In A Comic Role for ‘Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2’.
  • He got Vogue Beauty Award for Heartthrob of the Year for 2018.
  • Kartik also got Dadasaheb Phalke Excellence Award in Best Entertainer of the Year for ‘Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety’ in 2018
  • He got Nickelodeon Kids’ Choice Awards India in Dynamic Performer Award category for Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety movie in 2019.

Salary and Net Worth

Kartik has an estimated net worth of almost $3 Million. He earns almost ₹3 crores for every movie he plays as salary. He purchased a BMW 5 Series car recently.

Contact Address

House Address

Kartik bought a 1-BHK apartment in Mumbai’s Versova for Rs 1.60 crore. Where he used to stay as a paying guest. He also wants to purchase a sea-facing house in Bandstand.

Facts about Kartik Aaryan

  • Kartik had started dreaming of becoming an actor when he was in his 10th standard.
  • During the shooting of his debut film ‘Pyaar Ka Punchnama’, he lived in a rented 2BHK flat with 12 roommates in Lokhandwala, Mumbai.
  • Apart from acting, Kartik is also a successful model and has done several modeling assignments.
  • Firstly, He does not take junk food. As he is a vegetarian, he includes a lot of protein-rich food in his diet and eats every 2 hours.
  • Though he is a vegetarian, he ate 25 eggs every day to gain weight for his film ‘Akaash Vani’ (2013).
  • Before the release of his film ‘Kaanchi: The Unbreakable’ (2014), he had changed his on-screen name to Kartik Aaryan.
  • He is a huge fan of Shah Rukh Khan and considers him his acting inspiration.
  • Kartik Aaryan’s film “Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety” was one of the highest-grossing films of 2018.
  • Furthermore, in 2019, Kartik made his debut in Dabboo Ratnani’s calendar photoshoot.
  • Moreover, Kartik is the brand ambassador of the cream Emami Fair and Handsome and also for the body spray Envy1000.
  • On the other hand, In 2016, he was a member of the All-Stars Football Club, which organizes the football matches for charity.
